Go! 77. The door knob is turning more vigorously, but still not opening. Julie and Ernie get in the hole with Worm, while Rick attends to the almost-full Pepsi cup of sludge.
Elijah is still having trouble with his grip.
Rick pops the plastic lid onto the Pepsi cup, and climbs the hole. He rests the cup on the floor and lifts the flo board over his head. The RUMBLING gets louder as the tunn walls start to crumble.

Rick! Come on! Rick is losing his balance as the ground shifts beneath h He sways, and knocks the Pepsi cup of sludge rolling. He watches, helpless, as it rolls across the floor and comes a stop across the room. For a second, he contemplates mak a dash.
Elijah has wrapped his shirt tails around the knob, and finally has a good grip. He twists the knob...

Rick sees the door opening. He dives down into the hole. The floor board falls into place just as Elijah walks in. Elijah scans the room. He goes over towards the Tasty Fre machine and finds the styrofoam cup.
Bad for the environment. He crumples it in his hand.

The "antfarm view" again. We see the freaks running back through the tunnel as it caves in behind them. Toad sits the ground above, oblivious to them. We hear a low flying aircraft... ZAP! Toad shoots his tongue up out of frame a sucks the twin engine Cessna into his mouth. Beat. He BUR and spits up a propeller. 78.

The freaks wait by the mouth of the tunnel. We hear the rumble approach. The worm, JulieErnie, and finally Rick scramble out of the opening. The dirt avalanche is stoppe short by Paul Lynde's corpse, just as Rick scrambles to safety.
Just made it!
Paul saved our lives!
Way to go, Paul! Nosey claps Paul on what's left of his back--his skeleton shatters and the tunnel collapses, burying him instantly. The freaks are horrified.
turns to them guiltily in SLOW-MOTION. His voice is slowe down and distorted like John Lennon at the end of "Strawb
I... buried... Paul. Back to normal speed.
This is no time to lament over a cadaver! We've got to get moving, or we're history! Now c'mon! Nosey is still morose. He speaks backwards and sounds a l like "Revolution #9".
Daed si luap. SUBTITLE: "Paul is dead."
I said enough! Okay, listen up, everybody. We cracked the code and made the ointment we need to bring Skuggs down for good. The freaks applaud and cheer. 79.
But we left it in the lab. The freaks jeer and pelt Rick with rotten vegetables. He desperately pulls a bag of cookies out of his pocket.
But wait! I found some macaroons! And there's plenty for all of us! The freaks burst into applause again.
Yaayyy!

The Freaks are all sleeping, macaroon crumbs still left o their faces. There's a lot of snoring. Rick awakens with start. He hears something in the distance. Something like helicopter... He gets up and peeks out a crack in the wal

An EES corporate helicopter touches down. A few gun-totin SECURITY GUYS in dark suits and dark glasses get out. The check that the coast is clear, then give the signal. Out steps Richard Hertz. He mutters something to one of the security guys, and walks towards the Freak House.

(under his breath) I don't believe it. What's Hertz doin' here? The door to the Freak House opens. Hertz enters, unzips h fly. Finding no toilet, he shrugs and relieves himself on the floor. Rick steps out of the shadows towards him.
So EES is in bed with Elijah C. Skuggs, eh? Figures. Hertz is momentarily startled by Rick. He collects himsel
Rick! Thank God I got to you in time! 80.
Cut the crap, Hertz. Hertz relieves himself as he talks.

Ricky, you have no idea how your misfortune has touched our hearts. When you disappeared we almost gave up hope. But we'd heard reports of Skuggs's reckless abuse of Noxon, and when the story broke in the tabloids, I decided to personally come down and get to the bottom of things. He zips up and heads to the door.
Really?
No.

head_text.subj: AHA HA HEE HEE HO HO HA HA HEE HEE
HO HO HO HA HA HA HA

text: The cackle is unmistakable--Rick's face twists in horror he realizes... Hertz is THE LAUGHING MAN! Hertz ducks out the door. Rick looks after him, stunned. We hear a nearby SNORE cut off, and the Human Torch stand from the spot where Hertz relieved himself. He's dripping wet and no longer on fire. He sniffs his soaked, smolderi clothing.

Peuw! Hey! Of all the... That really pisses me off! POOF! He catches fire again and walks off. Rick is doing slow burn, still looking after Hertz. He erupts and his monster eye glows briefly. He screams in anguish.

Dejected, Rick leans against the wall. JulieErnie walk up behind him. Julie puts a hand on Rick's shoulder to comfo him. As they look into each other's eyes, a loud CRASH distracts them. Rick peers through the crack. 81.
A caravan of EES trucks crash through the front gate and drive up to the lab. There's a few cargo trucks and a hug NOXON-24 tanker.

Holy shit. A forklift drives out of the back of one of the large tru carrying the old corporate farts on a wooden palette. One of them falls off, and a bunch of WORKMEN scramble ou prop him up and push him back into place.

Elijah switches on the lights, and turns to face his audience. Hertz is accompanied by his stone-faced securit men and various executives. Workmen are busy installing t old board of directors and their arm-raising pulley syste
Nice to see you in the flesh, Laughing Man.

No need to use codenames, Elijah. We're all friends here. And just to prove it, I brought you a little present. Hertz snaps his fingers and nods to a security guy, who produces a wriggling canvas sack. He dumps its contents o the lab table--it's Stuey Gluck! His glasses come tumblin out after him. He squints at the security guy.
Rick? Is that you?
Who's the troll?
He was asking questions about Coogan, causing trouble. We figured he was one of yours. Stuey puts on his glasses. Elijah looks him up and down.
I make freaks alright, but come on, fellas--this thing's pathetic. 82.
Well you're no Julio Iglesias yourself, mister.
Rick! Riiiick! Riii--
Rick hears Stuey's voice in his head, all echoey.
--iiiiiick!
Oh no, not now, Stuey! The ghostly image of STUEY gradually takes shape in front Rick. Rick can make out the lab table Stuey's on, and som shadowy figures in the background.
Hey. That's Elijah's lab!
Stuey! Are you really in the lab?
Stuey is still wailing, and everybody else is getting pre damn annoyed.
Yes! I'm in the lab! I'm in the lab!
Not only ugly, he's crazy too. Toad grabs Stuey and slaps a piece of tape over his mouth He throws him into one of the chicken cages along the far wall. A two-headed chicken starts to peck at him.
So, where were we?

Gentlemen, I'm not going to bullshit you. I know my setup here at Freakland looks like small potatoes. 83. He pulls the cover off a small scale model of Freakland, about ten inches high. It shows the stage, lab, outhouse, the head, everything.

But thanks to your Noxon and my genius, tonight I will turn Ricky Coogan into a freak so hideous, it'll be enough to turn your stomach inside out, boil your brain in its own juice, and cause cold sores you thought had healed up to start buggin' you again. (the EES men shift
It's the dawning of a new age for us all. Behold, Super Mega Freak World! He whisks the cover off another scale model--it's exactly same as the little model except it's a lot bigger.
It's really somethin', huh?
Very impressive.
We'll kick Disney's dead ass!
Rick is watching all of this in a ghostly image.
Stuey! Stuey, can you hear me? Stuey's image, still with his mouth taped shut and the chicken pecking at him, nods yes.
Mmm hmmm!
I want you to try and escape. Get the cup from underneath the instrument table and bring it to me, okay?
Mmmm mmmmm! 84. He gives Rick the old trademark Coogan thumbs up. Rick halfheartedly returns the gesture.
Yeah, right. Get movin'.

Stuey checks to make sure nobody's watching him. They're not. He removes the spring from a pocket pen and picks th lock. Stuey searches the floor, and spots the Pepsi cup. He'll have to crawl through several pairs of legs to reac it.
At EES, our plans for your Gene Machine include everything, except shoes that is. Ha-ha-ha.
Ha-ha. Gee, I'd love to see your plans.

We'd love to show you. (to his assistant) Bill, if you'd be so kind. BILL BLAZER, a slick and dashing EES marketing executive, strides confidently up to the podium. Stuey has to duck the fast approaching legs. Bill steps o him, not even noticing he's there. Bill takes Elijah's "Freak World" graphic off an easel, a replaces it with his own. Finding no place to deposit Elijah's, he simply drops it on the floor. Elijah looks a little hurt.

What does today's businessman want? How about a receptionist with six arms, five mouths, and a knockout figure? That'd sure speed things up, wouldn't it? With a big smile, Bill reveals an illustration of a multi limb secretary (in a sexy dress) talking on three differe phones, taking notes, and typing, all at once. Stuey heads towards the Pepsi cup. He brushes against the back of Hertz's legs. Hertz looks over at Elijah beside h who smiles politely. Hertz smiles back, invitingly. Maybe there's a few things we don't know about him. 85.
In the factory, how 'bout a worker with twelve busy hands, no mouth to talk back, and no genitalia or digestive system to distract him from his work?

Sure! It's what we all dream of! The EES guys all nod along. Except for the workmen, who exchange worried looks. Elijah's still not sure what to m of it all. Meanwhile, Stuey has the Pepsi cup of sludge in hand, and he's crawling under the table towards the door. He brushe up against the back of Elijah's legs. Elijah looks over to Hertz, who gives him that smile agai Elijah looks away quickly, panicky.

Well, with this Skuggs-based Noxon technology, it's not only possible, it's just the beginning! Of course, what happened to our expensive spokesman Ricky Coogan was an unfortunate coincidence, but profits from these new markets could total in the billions. All the executives turn to Hertz. He cracks a smile.
Ricky who? The executives laugh heartily. Stuey glances across the r to the door. He has to make a break for it, so he does.
Hey! Hold on! Stuey freezes. He's right out in the open, in plain view. Still, nobody seems to see him. They're still watching- Bill's presentation.
Secretaries? Worker drones? Where's the fun? Where's the spark? Where's the unspeakable evil? Bill laughs pleasantly.

Ha-ha. I was just getting to that. 86. Bill launches back into his speech with more intensity th even the best infomercials. Meanwhile, Stuey inches towar the door, moving as imperceptibly as possible.
We'll impact every field.

creams, nosejobs in a bottle. Military--human death machines that make Schwarzenegger look like a pansy! And why stop at consumer products? Hell, we can design a whole new consumer! A few well placed drops in the water supply, and bingo! It's a new master race, and we own the copyright! An entire planet of freaks owned and operated by us! Every part of their bodies comes from an EES supplier, every thought they think is EES policy! From now on gentlemen, it's EES uber alles! EES uber alles! The EES guys clap and shout approval. Elijah's impressed too. He leans over to Hertz.
This guy's good.
We lured him away from A.T.&T. Stuey is finally out the door. Of course, now they spot h
Look! The troll!
After him!
Stuey is outside the lab. Inexplicably, (actually it's ju because he's so stupid) he's still moving inch by inch. H calls to Rick through the tape on his mouth.
Mmm! Mmmmm!
Rick sees the image of Stuey inching away from the lab. 87.
Take the tape off your mouth, idiot! They didn't tie your hands! Stuey realizes this is true, and pulls the tape off his mouth.
I got the cup, Rick!
Great! There's no time to waste. Are you being followed?
Yeah. But if I don't move, they won't see me. Two big EES security guys are standing watching Stuey's o behavior. They pick him up and carry him away.
Riiiick! Rick sees this all in his holographic image. It fades.
What a geek. He turns to the other freaks, who've woken up and are gathered around on the floor. Rick shakes his head.
Stuey got caught. There's no way to get the ointment before the show.
So, that's it then? We're all to die... And by your hand no less.

No. It won't be me. It's some inhuman monster Elijah used me to create. As for me, the real me, I'll always be your friend. Before I have to rip your heads off, I'd like to say goodbye to each of you. (He turns to Worm.) Worm... I'll miss your brains, the smell of your pipe, and the funny way you always go on talking until everyone wants to strangle you. He pats the Worm on the head tenderly, and turns to Cowbo 88.
Hi, Rick.

Cowboy, I'll miss your good humor, your down-home wisdom, and of course, the frothy milkshakes were udderly delicious, heh-heh... He smiles and playfully tugs Cowboy's udder. He turns to Bearded Lady.
Bearded... Lady... I dunno. We'll always have Paris... Bearded lady is kind of confused, Rick shrugs.
Nosey, I never really liked you. He moves on to Frog Man.
Frog Man, I think death is probably the best thing for you now. Frog Man nods in agreement. Rick rpaches JulieErnie.

Ernie... Julie... I have mixed feelings. (He turns to Ernie) On one hand, I'll remember you as the best friend a jerk like me ever had, and a low down repulsive slimeball. He turns to Julie. ROMANTIC MUSIC swells up.
On the other hand, I really respect you, and more than that, I, uh, well, I wish we'd had the chance to boink.
Oh, Rick... They embrace. Rick calls out to the assembled group.
Today I make the proudest boast a man can utter: "Ich bien ein Freak!" 89. They're all ready to cheer, but they're confused by his b German. Rick has to explain himself.
Uh, I'm a freak. Oh. They all get it. Beat. Then they cheer.
A huge banner reads "NEW IMPROVED BEAST BOY SLAUGHTERS HI
ONLY!". We can hear the sound of the crowd inside.

There's a typically smallish crowd in addition to the EES executives who occupy the front seats. The security goons are strategically situated throughout the tent, and two o them sit on either side of Stuey in the second row. Elija is onstage.

And now the moment you've all been waiting for. Ladies and gentlemen, meet the lucky young man who's about to be become the monster with the mostest! Here he is, the Beast Boy! Toad pulls a rope and the curtain opens, revealing Rick strapped to an operating table. On stage left there's a large cage containing all the other freaks. Including the unconscious, half-naked Milk Man who Rick knocked out in freak house. The Milk Man domes to, looks around in a pan grabs the bars of the cage, and screams--
Rick searches the cheering audience for Stuey, who waves Pepsi cup full of glop in the air. Rick hears Stuey's voi echo in his head telepathically.
Rick! Over here! Stuey's waving cup is blocking the view of a big, annoyed BIKER sitting behind him. Elijah quiets the crowd and hol up a beaker of ointment. 90.

With this remarkable ointment of my own design, I will now turn this half-finished ghoul into the ultimate super freak, dedicated to evil! Elijah puts on some rubber gloves and prepares to glop Ri who squints under the spotlight, still searching for Stue He calls out telepathically.
Stuey! Where are you?! Stuey stands up on his seat and waves the cup, totally blocking the biker's view. He telepathically replies.
Here I am, Rick!
Goddammit, kid! Would you sit down!? The biker grabs the cup and dumps it over Stuey's head. T "good ointment" runs down all over Stuey's body.
All eyes turn to Stuey, who falls down and disappears ont the floor screaming.
Oh no!

What the hell!? Suddenly an EIGHT FOOT TALL MONSTER VERSION OF STUEY leap its feet and snarls down at the biker. The biker pulls a switchblade and jams it into Stuey monster's leg--the bla crumples on his armor-like hide. Stuey grins and SLAM! He drives the biker into the ground like a railroad spike. H leaps onto the stage and stalks Elijah.
Rick and the freaks in the cage cheer stuey Monster on.
Uh-oh, that kid looks pissed. EYE
Eye and Eye rush the stage, Uzis firing.
The bullets bounce off Stuey's hide. He doinks them with big monster fingers and sends them flying through...
across the compound, and THWOPP! Into the Giant Head's ey sockets, where they spin around and come to a stop, cocke CRASH! The head's foundation crumbles and it keels over backwards.
Elijah calls out to Toad.
Stuey Monster roars at Toad. Toad smiles weakly.

Toad catapults through it, follows the path of Eye and Ey across the compound and CRASH! Lands head first into the neck of the Giant Head. He gets up with the Giant Head st on his own head, making him look like one of those big he caricatures. He runs blindly across the yard and into...
ZZZAAAAPPP! BOINNGG! Eye and Eye zing out of the sockets, and Toad's tongue sticks ten feet out of the Giant Head's mouth. It's the biggest Tex Avery cartoon take ever!
looks worried. He scoops up some "evil ointment".
Looks like it's time to roll out the big gun.
Sayonara, kiddo. Any last words? Rick considers it. He can't think of anything.
Nahh. 92.
Suit yourself. He raises the ointment over Rick. Rick has an idea for a last word.
Wait! Wait! (Elijah pauses. Rick
Nahh. Elijah glops Rick. His skin starts to smoke.
Stuey Monster stalks Elijah onstage. Rick is smoking and shaking violently on the table.
turns to his EES cronies in the audience. He looks bored.
What a waste of twelve bucks. Let's get the machine and go. The other executives nod.

starts to transform. FWOOP! His ears spring out into huge monster ears, kinda like in Pinocchio. FWAAP! His mouth grows into a massive, Big Daddy Roth style monster mouth. FWEEP! His upper head does the same. His body follows suit. He bursts' out of the straps and grows into a drooling TEN FOOT TALL RICK MONSTER. He snar at Stuey Monster.
The crowd and the other freaks look on, tense. Stuey Mons instinctively whips out a Ricky Coogan publicity photo an pen.
Rick! Rick! Could you sign this!? Rick Monster snarls and bashes Stuey Monster in the face. Stuey Monster jams the pen through the photo and snarls b 93.

Even Julie is screaming "Fight! Fight," beside herself wi bloodthirsty glee. Ernie smacks her. The crowd goes nuts as the monsters trade a series of cli pro-wrestling moves. Stuey bashes Rick. Rick bashes Stuey etc.
Give him the skull cracker, ya big goon!
No way! The skull cracker is an illegal move! Stuey grabs Rick's hair and marches him around the stage. The crowd is taking sides, screaming out advice, and foam at their mouths.
Let's get this over with. Hey Hertz, tell your goons to (he turns to Hertz and is
What the hell-!?
stands in front of the a group of EES HARDHATS who are us forklifts to move the Tasty Freekz Machine towards the ex He notices Elijah and taps his executive ASSISTANT.
Ahem. At this point in time we at EES regret that we must leave this performance prematurely.
What are you saying!?
What we're saying is... get stuffed, yokel.
I figured I couldn't trust you corporate greaseballs! Elijah turns to an alarm box on the wall which reads "BRE

head_text.subj: GLASS IN CASE OF DOUBLECROSSING CORPORATE GREASEBALLS." H

text: breaks the glass and pulls the lever inside. 94. A trapdoor on the stage opens and a large chemical tank r out of it. Elijah jumps into the seat of the gun turret nozzle atop the tank. He aims the nozzle at the EES group
Let me proudly introduce the latest in our product line, Noxon 25--now available in a convenient pump!
Bullshit! The Everything Except Shoes corporation releases no new products unless I give the order!

I think it's time EES branched out a little. He presses the plunger and the nozzle spews a torrent of yellow glop on the EES people. They scream in agony as th bodies melt together into one big mutating blob. Alistair Cooke stands up in the audience--he's got a head bandage and a crutch from being trampled at the last show
Ahhh! Head for the hills before he gets all of us! The crowd goes berserk and rushes the exits, trampling po Cooke like a roach.
flips Stuey onto the ground and starts stomping on him. Stuey is knocked out cold. Rick leaves him on the floor a stalks the freak cage murderously.

head_text.subj: NOW I RIP FREAKS TO PIECES

text: No! We're your friends!

Oh. NOW I RIP FRIENDS TO PIECES! He rips some bars off the cage and is about to spear JulieErnie with a jagged steel bar when Stuey Monster gra his leg and trips him. Stuey summons all his remaining energy to wrestle Rick, delaying him, for the moment, fro slaughtering the freaks. Meanwhile, Elijah is watching as

solidifies into... A GIANT SHOE made of living flesh. It' got eyeballs where the eyes should be, a tongue where the tongue should be, but it's helpless and immobile. Elijah looks at it with pride. He does his best Ed Sulliv

Now that's a really, really big shoe. Ha-ha-ha-ha! Hmmm, I think I'd like a pair of those! He swivels the nozzle turret towards the cage full of fre and is about to glop them when Rick stands up above Stuey blocking Elijah's trajectory at the freak cage. Rick rais the jagged bar above Stuey, ready to drive it down throug his chest.
(to Rick monster) Would you hurry up and waste the troll, please!? I got a lonely shoe over here! Rick Monster nods and drives the spear down when we...
Rick's silhouette (which matches his ten foot monster incarnation) is immersed in the story.
And then...
Sorry to interrupt Rick, but you've been talking for almost ninety minutes, and we've just got to go to a commercial.
Sorry.
We'll be right back after this, folks.
A fine array of different kinds of cheese on a chopping block.
You like cheese. You like being a man. That's why you like.. A BURLY HAND swipes all the cheese off the block and slam down an aluminum can labeled "MACHEESMO."
Macheesemo. Real cheese for real men. Now in a handy aluminum dispenser. The hand crushes the can and gooey yellow cheese squirts the top.
We hear a music bite from "Le Freak."
And now back to the exciting conclusion of Ricky Coogan's incredible story.
Well, let's see, the other freaks were lined up in Elijah's sights, and I was about to shove a pipe through Stuey's skull, when all of a sudden, I heard a voice...
Rick stops the spear inches from Stuey's chest. Their eye meet.
Kill him! Kill him! Elijah's bloodthirsty goading fades away, and Cowboy's vo reverberates in Rick's head. 97.

I reckon that troll could help you if you just let him into your heart... your heart... your heart... The voice keeps echoing. A tear wells up in Rick Monster' eye. He looks over at Cowboy, who is actually calling out him from the cage.

Your heart... your heart... your heart... Rick Monster loses his murderous glare. He breaks into a warm smile, throws the pipe away and helps Stuey Monster They hug. The rest of the Freaks cheer wildly.
Atta' boy Coog!
Hey, ain't that somethin'? The Worm is gushing sentimentally. He tries to hide his tears.
Tosh. (Sniff) Sentimental claptrap (Sniff) Shameless, maudlin--Baaa! He can't hold it in anymore. He bawls like a baby. Meanwhile, Elijah is hopping mad.

Cut the lovey-dovey bullshit, and start mutilating each other! He aims at Rick Monster and presses the fire button. The Glop starts to flow, but before it can make it out of the tip, Rick grabs hold of the nozzle, and twists it around face Elijah.

Raarrrrrrgh! Elijah manages to duck just in time. A stream of yellow Noxon 25 glop flies over his shoulder, and lands in the D TANK full of carbolic acid that sits off to one side of t tent. The acid and the Noxon mix together and bubble up menacin Elijah hops down out of the gunner's chair and squares of against Rick Monster. 98. Meanwhile, Stuey Monster has released the other freaks fr the cage. They watch the confrontation from a distance. Elijah rolls up his sleeves. Rick growls and advances slowly.

You think I made you strong? HA! I've cranked my DNA up so high, you won't know what hit you. I'm a wrecking machine! Aaaaaaa! He rushes at Rick and delivers a flurry of punches to his section. They have absolutely no effect. Rick brings one heavy fist slamming down on Elijah's head, stopping him c
Ow! I think you crushed my spinal cord. I can't feel anything in my fingers.
Maybe you'll feel this ... Rick rears back to kick him.
Qait--if you kill me, you'll never find the antidote. The freaks all perk up. Rick's skeptical.
What antidote?
A time release serum--I baked it into a delicious batch of macaroons. A slow smile grows on the Freaks' faces, especially Rick'

If you ask me, you skimped on the coconut! THWAK! Rick boots Elijah between the legs, sending him flying through the air. He lands on the DUNK TANK SEAT ov the bubbling Noxon/Acid. Dazed, he looks at the bullseye target, and back at Rick. Summoning up his last ounce of bravado, Elijah makes a last stand. 99.
Come on, Coogan! Come oooon! You haven't got the guts to kill me! Go on! I dare ya'! Rick ponders for a second. He looks over to Julie. Then..
Yap! Yap!
Scrappy! Scrappy the dog rushes in. He leaps up and presses the bullseye, dropping Elijah into the hideous mixture.

Elijah struggles in agony. His body bubbles and mutates i the thick toxic soup. He sinks lower and lower into the gunk, until he and his cries are buried for good. Scrappy leaps into Rick's arms and licks his face.
Yap!
Atta boy, Scrap! BLAM! BLAM! The tent flaps fly open and a half dozen FBI AGENTS rush in with guns drawn.
Freeze, FBI! Another FBI GUY investigates the dunk tank, sees Elijah's floating on top of the bubbling ooze.
Looks like they took care of Skuggs, chief. The chief nods. They put away their guns, and approach Ri and the rest of the jubilant freaks.
Nice work, Ricky. You'll get a medal from the Vice President for this.
Great. But how did you-- 100.
We've been following Skuggs for years. Scrappy just filled in some of the details.
Yap!
Thank heavens you brought him to justice, Rick. God only knows how far his sick plans would've gone.
Hey chief, look at this! The FBI guy has peeled the decal off the Pepsi machine, revealing that it's actually a Coke machine! The chief is sickened to the core.
Is nothing sacred? Suddenly, the agents are distracted by a terrible scream. They turn to the dunk tank and are shocked by what they s
Oh, my Lord!

No! It can't be! We SWISH PAN over to reveal a DRIPPING BLOB climbing out the dunk tank. The blob separates into two distinct entit with their backs to us. They turn around and...my God it's... it's....
Or at least a damn fine mutant imitation of them. Call him/them ELIJUS and ELLY LEE. They both have glowing red demon eyes and speak in Elijah's voice.
Thought you killed me, huh?
What the hell are you looking at?
Two pieces of deadmeat! 101. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The FBI guys open fire. We show only the horrified reactions of the freaks as they look on.
Rick, Regis, and Kathie Lee are still in silhouette.
And that's my story.
It was so exciting!
And long! My God! It makes War and Peace sound like a warm up act!
Okay! We got light!

It's fixed? Well, it's about time! The lights come on--no more silhouettes. Ricky looks perfectly normal, his old self. His weird silhouette was caused by a potted plant and some strange hanging mobile behind him.
That's better.
I'll say.
How 'bout it, folks. Let's hear it for Ricky Coogan! The audience applauds and hoots wildly.

Can we bring out the other freaks now? The audience cheers as the rest of the Freaks walk out fr the wings, and stand off to the side waving to the audien They all look clean cut and happy. They wear T-shirts wit their former identities printed on them. "I was NOSEY," " was COWBOY," "I was the BEARDED LADY" etc. Except the Wor who's still a worm. His T-shirt says, "I'm Still THE WORM 102.
Ridiculous... Just because a man doesn't like macaroons... Nonsense. Suddenly a squirrel runs across stage, followed by Juan. pounces and catches the furry little bugger.
Gotcha! Damn, it's about time!
(happy to see him)
Hey guys! Jeez! You look great! They all hug.
That's just great. What a story. And what an ending! Elijah transformed by the goop!
And he really looked like--?

Exactly like you two, I swear. Same faces, same outfits, except they had these really big, hideous feet... He looks down at Regis and KATHIE LEE's feet--they're big hideous monster feet! Suddenly their eyes glow bright red It's Elijus and Elly Lee! They speak with Elijah's voice.
Show's over, Ricky!

I'm gonna drink your blood! Elly Lee pulls a machete and is about to force it down on Rick's throat when... BANG! BANG! BANG! Elijus and Elly Lee's eyes go funny. They look at each other, spit up some blood, wave to the audience one last time, and collapse to the floor. Julie stands behind them, smoking gun in hand. She rushes to Ri They embrace.
Rick! It's finally over! 103.
Yes... Yes it is.
Rick! Rick! Rick and Julie turn and see Stuey, still a ten foot tall monster, running towards them. He's carrying a garbage ba dripping blood.
Stuey!
Look! I found the real Regis and Kathie Lee! Rick and Julie look at the bag, mortified. Stuey chuckles
No, this is just my lunch! Rick and Julie sigh with relief. Stuey pulls out a simila leaking bag and holds it up.
(matter of fact) This is Regis and Kathie Lee. Rick and Julie nod casually--"Oh."

Awwww! Suddenly Elijus and Elly Lee pop up from behind the couch bloodied, but still fierce. They're about to stab Rick an Julie when... BANG! BANG! BANG! BANG! BANG! Five more shots ring out and they fall dead--again. Ernie stands off to the side with a smoking gun.
Oh, like that wasn't totally predictable.
Well, now it really is over. Sappy END OF THE MOVIE MUSIC wells up.
Thank God. You know, this adventure has taught me something.
When man starts impinging on the subtle perfection of the earth's natural order, the only thing he'll create is havoc.

Right, Coog. I learned somethin' too. That men and women truly are equals. That the human spirit transcends gender and physical appearance, and thus it is immune to the petty degradations men may devise. I believe it was Moliere
Julie's had enough. She socks Ernie square on the jaw.
Oh, shut up. (She turns to Rick) Let's go fuck. Rick gives her the thumbs up. They turn to the audience.
Good night, everybody! The audience cheers. The HIT SINGLE from the soundtrack album kicks in as we...

As the credits roll, and everybody continues to smile and wave at the cheering audience, Elijus and Elly Lee attack again. Ernie hands the gun to Stuey, who shoots them dead Well, dead-ish. Seconds later, after some more waving, th attack again. This time Nosey and the Bearded Lady stab t to death, sort of. A little more waving, before Elijus an Elly Lee make another pathetic attempt. They can barely stand. Cowboy clubs one with a mic stand. Worm head-butts the other. A few seconds later, Elijus's bloodied hand gropes its way over the top of the studio couch. Stuey ha to prop him up while members of the audience are invited to punch him in the chops. Ernie stands off to the side, charging everyone five bucks per blow. As we fade, everyone's having a go flipping, throwing, kicking and impaling rag doll replicas of America's favor morning show hosts.
